name: image-format-converter
title: Image Format Converter
description: Convert images between PNG, JPEG, and WebP formats
content:
Overview

This application converts images between different formats including PNG, JPEG, and WebP. Built using Pillow, it provides high-quality image format conversion with automatic handling of transparency and color modes.

Features

  • Convert between PNG, JPEG, and WebP formats
  • Automatic transparency handling for JPEG conversion
  • High-quality output with optimized compression
  • Preserves original filename with new extension

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Format: Select PNG, JPEG, or WebP
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a converted image file with the same base name but new extension in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Converting PNG images to JPEG for smaller file sizes
  • Converting images to WebP for modern web applications
  • Standardizing image formats across a project
  • Preparing images for specific platform requirements
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_${RANDOM}_${RANDOM}"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/image_format_converter.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -f "${outputFormat}"
